dreisoft.tresos.workflow.api.workflows

Class Workflows

  • java.lang.Object
    • dreisoft.tresos.workflow.api.workflows.Workflows

  • public class Workflows
extends java.lang.Object
    This class manages all registered workflows.

    The Workflows class manages all workflows registered via the extension-point dreisoft.tresos.workflow.api.plugin.workflow. In addition workflows can be registered via the methods registerWorkflow(File, APIOperationStatus) and registerWorkflow(URL, APIOperationStatus).

    This class is a singleton instance that can be queried with: 

     Workflows.getInstance()

    Copyright (C) Elektrobit Automotive GmbH - All rights reserved

    Since:
    10

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static Workflows getInstance()
        Query the Workflows singleton
        Returns:
        the singleton of this class

      • registerWorkflow

        public void registerWorkflow(java.io.File workflowFile,
                             APIOperationStatus status)
        Registers a new workflow represented by a workflow XML file. If a workflow with the same ID is already registered, the versions are compared. If the version of the new workflow is higher, then the already registered workflow is replaced. Else the new workflow is discarded.
        Parameters:
        workflowFile - The workflow file
        status - The APIOperationStatus
        Since:
        10

      • registerWorkflow

        public void registerWorkflow(java.net.URL workflowURL,
                             APIOperationStatus status)
        Registers a new workflow represented by a workflow URL. If a workflow with the same ID is already registered, the versions are compared. If the version of the new workflow is higher, then the already registered workflow is replaced. Else the new workflow is discarded.
        Parameters:
        workflowURL - The URL to the workflow file
        status - The APIOperationStatus
        Since:
        10

      • unregisterWorkflow

        Unregisters a workflow (this will not affect the GUI).
        Parameters:
        workflowId - The workflow Id to unregister
        Since:
        10

      • getWorkflowDescription

        public IWorkflowDescription getWorkflowDescription(java.lang.String workflowId)
        Returns the workflow description for the given Id
        Parameters:
        workflowId - The workflowId to return the description for.
        Returns:

      • setInitialWorkflowId

        public void setInitialWorkflowId(java.lang.String workflowId)
        Sets the initial workflow Id. If no workflow Id has been selected before, the workflow for the given ID will be displayed in the workflow view.
        Parameters:
        workflowId - The workflow Id to show on first setup.
        Since:
        10
